mapper.select: SELECT su_idx, su_name FROM cbt_subject WHERE su_is_blind = 0
SELECT sc_idx, sc_name, su_idx FROM cbt_subject_chapter WHERE su_idx = #{param1}

SELECT pc_idx, su_idx, sc_idx, pc_problem, pc_difficulty, pc_date, su_name, sc_name, mb_id FROM cbt_problem_create NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject_chapter WHERE su_idx = #{su_idx}

SELECT a.pc_idx ,a.su_idx ,a.sc_idx ,a.pc_problem ,a.pc_difficulty ,a.pc_date ,b.su_name ,c.sc_name ,a.mb_id ,(SELECT CEIL((SELECT COUNT(ta_idx) FROM cbt_test_answer WHERE pc_idx = a.pc_idx AND ta_is_answer = 'O') / (SELECT COUNT(ta_idx) FROM cbt_test_answer WHERE pc_idx = a.pc_idx) * 100)) as answerPercent ,(select count(ps_idx) from cbt_problem_save where pc_idx= a.pc_idx) as saveCnt
FROM cbt_problem_create as a NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject as b NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject_chapter as c ORDER BY a.pc_idx DESC LIMIT #{skip} , 10

FROM cbt_problem_create as a NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject as b NATURAL JOIN cbt_subject_chapter as c
ORDER BY a.pc_idx DESC LIMIT #{param4} , 10
